articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets CILRECO Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets CILRECO Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with a delegation of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea led by honorary Chairman Robert Charvin at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the visiting delegation of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea.
					 The gift was conveyed by its honorary Chairman Robert Charvin, head of the delegation, to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Thursday.

articles.title: Greetings to Moldovan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Moldovan President
Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Vladimir Woronin, President of the Republic of Moldova, on its national day.
					Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would strengthen and develop, Kim in the message wished the President and people of Moldova successes in their work for the country's progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Friendly Gathering with Libyan Officials Held
articles.content:
Friendly Gathering with Libyan Officials Held
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A friendly gathering with staff members of the Economic Cooperation Bureau of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya here was held at the DPRK-Libya Friendship Aeguk Moran Clothing Factory on Thursday on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the Great September First Revolution in Libya.
					 Present there on invitation were Abdelhafiz Misbah Bin Rabha, chief of the bureau, and its staff members.
					
					 On hand were officials concerned and officials of the factory.
					
					 After being briefed on the history of the factory, the attendants looked round the production sites. They talked to one another on the need to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Libya, deepening the friendship.

articles.title: Chairman of Int'l Martial Arts Games Committee Arrives
articles.content:
Chairman of Int'l Martial Arts Games Committee Arrives
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Chang Ung, president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation who is chairman of the International Martial Arts Games Committee, arrived here Thursday to participate in the celebrations of the 10th anniversary of the committee.

articles.title: Basketball Contest for August 28 Youth Cup Held
articles.content:
Basketball Contest for August 28 Youth Cup Held
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The 13th national youth and student basketball contest for August 28 Youth Cup was held in Hamhung, South Hamgyong Province.
					 The contest was divided into the group of university and college students and that of working youth.
					
					 Male and female students of Kim Il Sung University placed first in the group of students.
					
					 Male teachers of O Jung Hup Chongjin University of Education No.1 came first in the group of working youth.

articles.title: Pheasants and Roe Deer Bred and Set free in Korea
articles.content:
Pheasants and Roe Deer Bred and Set free in Korea
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- North Hwanghae Province of Korea has bred and set free more than 2.2 million pheasants and roe deer in mountains over last three decades.
					 Last year alone, the province raised more than 85,000 pheasants and 2,200 roe deer. 
					
					  Cities and counties of the province have built corrals in various places favorable for the inhabitation of pheasants and roe deer and are increasing the number of the animals, securing breed animals and doing their raising and management in a scientific and technological way.
					
					 The province has set animal reserves suited to their proliferation and is regularly conducting the work of making favorable conditions for the growth of pheasants and roe deer by planting lots of trees.
					
					 Besides, it is arranging fodder conditions so that they adapt themselves to the changed environment.
					
					 Today officials and working people of the province are successfully carrying on the work for breeding more pheasants and roe deer, prompted by a patriotic spirit to turn their villages into beautiful ones good to live in.

articles.title: Valuable Mountain of Korea
articles.content:
Valuable Mountain of Korea
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Komdok area in the northeastern part of South Hamgyong Province is called as "Kumgol" (gold valley), "Tonsan" (mountain of money) and "Paekgumsan" (white gold mountain).
					 It is abundant in lead, zinc and magnesite.
					
					 There are the Ryongyang Mine, the Komdok Mining Complex and the Taehung Youth Hero Mine, which have greatest mineral deposits in the world.
					
					 The Ryongyang Mine is endowed with magnesite ore.
					
					 Even the stone powder on the road is also priceless.
					
					 The Taehung Youth Hero Mine, which was developed on a full scale in the 1980s, can produce several million tons of magnesite ore in a chute. There is a peak with ore body exposed to the ground, the deposits of which is inexhaustible.
					
					 The predecessor of the Komdok Mining Complex is the Komdok Mine. The place was called "Komidok" as the mountains spread out like spider's web. The mountains are rich in mineral deposits. Up to now the complex has excavated minerals tantamount to one of the spider's legs. Galena produced at the complex contains 30-odd precious metals including lead and zinc.
					
					 The introduction of facilities based on latest science and technology makes it possible to increase the mineral production in mines and enterprises of this area and enables the smeltery to turn out products whose purity is higher than before. In particular, the complex has successfully realized the production of magnesia clinker entirely with domestic raw materials in a Juche-oriented way.
					
					 The mines and enterprises in the area are striving hard to surpass the record production level of the past within a few years and to export quality mineral products to foreign countries.

articles.title: U.S. Strategy for Aggression against DPRK Blasted
articles.content:
U.S. Strategy for Aggression against DPRK Blasted 
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The United States foolishly seeks to realize its strategy for aggression against the DPRK by pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the worst phase and, furthermore, create an international environment favorable for carrying out its strategy for world hegemony.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The U.S. has further intensified its military blackmail, sanctions upon and blockade against the DPRK than ever before, considering it as one of the important levers for realizing its wild ambition for world hegemony to carry out its anti-DPRK strategy. 
					
					 The U.S. regards the Korean Peninsula as the object it should put under its control under any circumstances in order to carry out its strategy for world hegemony.
					
					 When the peninsula is put under its control the U.S. can extend the sphere of its military activities in Northeast Asia close to the borders of China and Russia. This is what the U.S. regards most important and eyes at present. 
					
					 It is the calculation of the U.S. bellicose forces that the tenser they render the situation on the Korean Peninsula, while staging large-scale war exercises against the backdrop of tightened sanctions and increased pressure upon the DPRK, the more favorable opportunity will present itself for its aggression against it.
					
					 The U.S. is contemplating waging the second Korean war as a final operation for laying an all-out military siege to the Eurasian continent. 
					
					 Under the grave situation where the dark clouds of a nuclear war are gathering to hang over the inviolable land of the DPRK due to the U.S. imperialists' reckless moves to ignite a war of aggression its army and people are fully ready to go into action and sharply watching every move of the enemies.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Roll back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Roll back Its Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Members of the delegation of the World Peace Council on a visit to the DPRK denounced the U.S. for threatening peace on the Korean Peninsula and obstructing the reunification of Korea and urged it to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK. 
					 Elke Zwinge-Makamizile, member of the council, accused the U.S. of staging nuclear war exercises with huge armed forces involved every year, straining the situation on the peninsula. 
					
					 If the U.S. sincerely wishes the reunification and peace of Korea, it should stop the reckless and dangerous nuclear war exercises, replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace agreement and withdraw its troops from south Korea at once, she urged.
					
					  Binayak Batachariya, member of the council, demanded the U.S. drop its hostile policy towards the DPRK and cease hamstringing the Korean people's efforts to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea in line with the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. 
					
					 Iraklis Tsavdaridis, executive secretary of the council, expressed full support to the Korean people in their struggle to force the U.S. to pull back its troops from south Korea, achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and carve out their future by their own efforts. 
					
					 The WPC strongly demands the U.S. roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK, he declared.

articles.title: Songun Leadership Feats of Kim Jong Il Praised
articles.content:
Songun Leadership Feats of Kim Jong Il Praised
Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the exploits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il was held in Democratic Congo and round-table talks, a photo exhibition and a film show in Iran and film shows in China, Russia, Malaysia and Nepal between Aug. 18 and 21 to mark the 49th anniversary of his start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Displayed at the venues of functions were photos on Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership exploits and photos of the DPRK prospering under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo and other speakers noted that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the army of the DPRK has grown to be invincible revolutionary armed forces while fully discharging its mission and role as the driving force of the revolution in defence of the country and socialist construction. And they stressed that nobody can match the Korean People's Army equipped with the steadfast spirit of devotedly defending their leader and the strong military force.
					
					 The manager of the Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm said it is the fruition of Kim Jong Il's tested Songun revolutionary leadership that the DPRK has achieved successes in building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the banner of independence against imperialism. Under his leadership the Korean people will surely open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the speaker added.
					
					 The director of a company of Russia said that Korea would be certainly reunified into one to shine brilliantly in the world thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were "Reply of Korea", "The Tower of the Juche Idea", "The Ever-victorious Military Ranks in Parade" and other Korean films.

articles.title: Songun Politics Hailed by Syrian
articles.content:
Songun Politics Hailed by Syrian
Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Saber Ballul, head of department of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus in Syria, released a statement on Aug. 17 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 The statement praised Kim Jong Il as the outstanding leader who fully inherited the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea and founder of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean People's Army, and his wisdom and disposition as the brilliant commander.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il, the DPRK could consolidate the national strength in every way and always emerge victorious in the confrontation with the imperialist forces and the Korean people could successfully launch two satellites which can be said to be a complex of ultra-modern science and technology, it noted.
					
					 The Songun politics is an invincible weapon and almighty treasured sword that ensures steady advance in face of any formidable enemy, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Report of KPA Supreme Command Supported
articles.content:
Report of KPA Supreme Command Supported
 Pyongyang August 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on August 22 in support of the report announced by the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army.
					 Expressing full support for the order of the KPA Supreme Command that the entire army, all the people and the whole country shall be put on a special alert from August 17, 2009, the statement said:
					
					 This self-defensive measure taken by the DPRK is just as it is intended to protect the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 Upon hearing the said report, the army and people of the DPRK will reliably protect the dignity of Juche Korea and defend the socialist fortress of the world impregnably.
					
					 We are sure that they will achieve a great victory in the 150-day campaign, too.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for Development of Foreign Friendship and Cooperation brought out in booklet General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner for Our Revolution" on August 20.
					 This work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which inherited and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflected the requirements of the times and the revolution. Also expounded in it are the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de la delegacion del CIERECO
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de la delegacion del CIERECO
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dirigiera la delegacion del Comite Internacional de Enlace por la Reunificacion y la Paz de Corea presidida por el presidente honorario, Robert Charvin, de visita en Corea.
					  El jefe de la delegacion lo entrego el dia 27 al vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Yang Hyong Sop.

articles.title: XIII torneo de baloncesto por Copa Juventud del 28 de agosto
articles.content:
XIII torneo de baloncesto por Copa Juventud del 28 de agosto
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar en Hamhung de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur el XIII torneo nacional de baloncesto de jovenes y estudiantes por la Copa Juventud del 28 de agosto.
					Esta competencia se efectuo dividida en las ramas de universitarios  y de jovenes trabajadores.
					
					   En el sector universitario los jugadores de ambos sexos de la Universidad  Kim Il Sung obtuvieron  el primer lugar y en el de jovenes trabajadores,  ganaron la victoria los jugadores de profesores y empleados de la Universidad Pedagogica No.1 O Jung Hup de Chongjin.

articles.title: Zona de Komdok - tesoro de Corea
articles.content:
Zona de Komdok - tesoro de Corea
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ATCC) -- La zona de Komdok situada al nordeste de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur es conocida como el "valle de oro" y "monte de dinero y platino" porque alli yace mucha cantidad de plomo, zinc y magnesita.
					En particular, la Mina de Ryongyang, el Complejo Minero de Komdok, la Mina Juventud Heroina de Taehung de esa zona tienen yacimientos de mayor dimension a escala mundial.
					
					La primera y la tercera producen enorme cantidad de magnesita.
					
					Especialmente, en la tercera mina, que comenzo a ser desarrollada en gran escala desde la decada de 1980, se puede producir en una piquera millones de toneladas. Es muy rico el yacimiento del deposito mineral de una colina que esta expuesto totalmente al aire.
					
					El nombre del Complejo Minero de Komdok proviene de la palabra "Komi" (arana).
					
					Es decir, los inagotables recursos minerales de aqui son enterrados como la telarana
					
					Hasta ahora, se extrajo solo una pata de esa arana. La galena de aqui contiene el plomo, el zinc y mas de 30 metales valiosos.
					
					Recientemente, las minas y las empresas de Komdok procuraron la garantia de aumentar la produccion de minerales introduciendo los equipos modernos basados en la ciencia y tecnica de punta.
					
					Por consiguiente, se hizo posible en la fundicion de metales no ferrosos fundir los productos de mayor pureza.
					
					Particularmente, la produccion del clinker de magnesia se hace estrictamente con las materias primas nacionales.
					
					Esas unidades trabajan ahora intensamente para romper en unos anos el record de produccion del pasado y exportar sus productos de buena calidad al mercado mundial.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica politica hostil a Corea de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica politica hostil a Corea de EE.UU. 
Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico este jueves un articulo individual revelando las necias maniobras de Estados Unidos dirigidas a cumplir su estrategia agresiva sobre Corea y crear el ambiente internacional favorable a su estrategia de dominio mundial al llevar a la peor fase la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					EE.UU. considera la primera estrategia como un eslabon importante para cumplir la segunda, comienza el articulista y prosigue:
					
					De ahi que recrudece ahora mas que nunca el chantaje militar, la sancion y el bloqueo contra la RPDC. 
					
					  La Peninsula Coreana es el blanco que debe tomar sin falta EE.UU. para ejecutar su estrategia de hegemonia mundial. 
					
					Si toma el control de esa area, EE.UU. podra remover el teatro de sus operaciones militares en el Nordeste Asiatico a las zonas fronterizas con China y Rusia. 
					
					  Las fuerzas belicistas estadounidenses creen que si agravan la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana con la sancion y presion a la RPDC por una parte y por la otra, con los ejercicios belicos de gran envergadura se dara la oportunidad decisiva para agredirla. 
					
					  En el mismo contexto, planea ejecutar la nueva guerra coreana como la ultima operacion para formar el cerco militar total sobre el continente eurasiatico. 
					
					  Debido a tales imprudentes acciones de EE.UU., se cierne sobre el sagrado territorio patrio el nubarron de guerra nuclear. 
					
					Bajo esta situacion tan grave, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea observan con alta vigilancia cada movimiento de los enemigos manteniendose en la perfecta disposicion combativa y de movilizacion.
